Distance.description: How far the player is from the target when swinging on it.

SwingSpeed.description: How fast you spin around the target.

SuccessSpeed.description: How much speed you'll fly off with if you time your jump correctly.

FailSpeed.description: How much speed you'll fly off with if you time your jump incorrectly.

LaunchAngle.description: The angle you'll fly off at.

UseFixedCamera.description: Whether the camera is set to focus on the target, or not changed at all.

IsVisible.description: Whether this object is visible or not.

Extra.value: Really awesome unused objects that function perfectly. They act like swing poles from past games, except they're WireTargets.
